title: Drawing, "Design for a Teapot (plan)", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black ink, brown ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed n graphite along drawn lid of teapot in a circle: ouverture a plomb du pied; to right: 14 (underlined) joues [flanges]
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Cylindrical teapot drawn in plan with a pointed spout, the back half of the body with applied vertical bands, surmounted by a circular lid and a handle indicated in brown ink, the lid surrounded by six applied balls. Underdrawing in graphite of teapot in golden section.
